LSTM modules.from sentence: In practice , the LSTM modules applied in our model have 200 output units .

initial learning rate.from sentence: The initial learning rate is set as 0.001 and decays 0.001 % every 100 steps .

model.from sentence: The model is optimized with the Adam algorithm ( Kingma and Ba , 2014 ) .

cross - sentence dependency.from sentence: In ASL , we calculate cross - sentence dependency using a multilayer perceptron with one hidden layer consisting of 150 hidden units .

up to 40 continuous sentences.from sentence: We randomly select up to 40 continuous sentences for training if the input is too long .
